ruleContent.content:
<js>
function decrypt(a, b, c) { 
	return java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/PKCS7Padding", b, c).decryptStr(a)
 };
try{
	result=src.replace(
		/<script>\s*(decrypt.*;)\s*<.?script>/g,(html,code)=>eval(String(code)) );
	}catch(err){
		java.log(err)
		//如果解密出错，记录日志并使用webView动态加载解密
		result=java.webView(null,baseUrl,null);
		}finally result;
</js>
